function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Overcrowding and space issues in a city like london","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High population density in big cities","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reproductive number r greater than 1","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Poor housing conditions with inadequate sanitation facilities and fresh water supply increase outbreak risks","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encroachment of natural habitats and closer encounters with wildlife increase the risk of zoonotic infections","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and confined spaces in buildings increase covid-19 transmission risk","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher ventilation rate and open windows may lead to increased exposure to air pollution and allergens.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited green space and space between buildings may lead to a higher risk of disease transmission.","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High usage of crowded public transport increases the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Threat of a second wave of covid-19 and future pandemics","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High rate of virus positivity from floor swab samples in icu and gw, indicating contamination of the built environment.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High rate of virus positivity on surfaces frequently touched by medical staff or patients, such as computer mice, trash cans, handrails, and doorknobs.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High rate of virus positivity on patient masks due to exhaled droplets and oral secretions.","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of partition in cubicles allowing direct transmission of aerosols between occupants","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High rates of positivity for sars-cov-2 aerosol exposure in air and swab samples","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 aerosol at all sampling sites, including near air outlets and in patients’ rooms","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High concentration of virus-laden aerosols near patients and downstream from patients","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sars-cov-2 aerosol distribution indicates a potential transmission distance of 4m","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Greater contamination of icu environment compared to general wards","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Widespread contamination of air and object surfaces in covid-19 wards by sars-cov-2.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor ventilation in indoor spaces associated with increased transmission of respiratory infections.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of respiratory droplets carrying sars-cov-2 prompted by airflow generated by air-conditioning.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Aerosol transmission via central air supply or drainage system in confined spaces.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential airborne transmission in specific situations","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Survival of sars-cov-2 in the air and on indoor surfaces","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 through ventilation ducts","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fecal-oral transmission of sars-cov-2","category":"Water","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inhalation transmission of sars-cov-2 in crowded indoor environments","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient outdoor air ventilation in building ventilation systems","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor air filtration in building ventilation systems","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation system operation hours","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variable and unpredictable airflow patterns in naturally ventilated buildings","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cross-infection due to the supply of recirculated air in buildings with centralized air-conditioning systems","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure of eyes and skin to uv-c radiation from uvgi lamps","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate control of temperature and humidity in buildings leading to increased transmission of infectious organisms","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of infection control strategies in the early stages of building design","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation leading to airborne transmission of sars-cov-2","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Operating hvac systems as usual during an outbreak","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of air handling units with recirculation and inadequate filtration","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Turning off toilet ventilation systems during the outbreak","category":"Water","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sars-cov-2 stability at different temperatures and humidity levels","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Effectiveness of filters and air cleaning methods","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of high relative humidity and low humidity levels","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Leakages in heat recovery equipment leading to higher air leakage rates","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of respiratory protection during filter replacement and maintenance work","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Open windows in toilets leading to improper pressure differentials and potential spread of airborne contaminants","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and outdoor air circulation","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of in-duct uv-c devices and ozone-emitting devices","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continuous operation of toilet exhaust system","category":"Water","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Closing the toilet window to maintain negative pressure","category":"Water","confidence":"High"}]}
